configuration.body: {"openAlarmsOnly":true,"criteria":"select * from alarm limit 100 page 0  Where state in [1,2,3,4,5,6]"}

commands.script:
file=/opt/cw/tmp/@job.execid@.json
#jq -r '.lsps[]| [ keys[] as $k | .[$k] ]| @csv' $file

#jq -r '.alarms | (.[].Created)|=(.|tonumber| gmtime| strflocaltime ("%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ"))|((.[].Updated))|=(.|tonumber| gmtime| strflocaltime ("%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ"))|(del(.[]."Events") |.[0]| keys_unsorted) as $keys | ([$keys] + map([.[ $keys[] ]])) [] | @csv' $file
#jq -r '[.alarms[] | [ [leaf_paths as $path | {"key": $path | join("_"), "value": getpath($path)}] | from_entries ] []] |  (.[0] | keys_unsorted) as $keys |   ([$keys] + map([.[ $keys[] ]])) [] | @csv' $file
jq -r '[.alarms[]|(..|select(has("Timestamp"))?).Timestamp|=(.|tonumber| gmtime| strflocaltime ("%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ")) |(..|select(has("Updated"))?).Updated|=(.|tonumber| gmtime| strflocaltime ("%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ"))| (..|select(has("Created"))?).Created|=(.|tonumber| gmtime| strflocaltime ("%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ"))|[ [leaf_paths as $path | {"key": $path | join("_"), "value": getpath($path)}] | from_entries ] []] |  (.[0] | keys_unsorted) as $keys |   ([$keys] + map([.[ $keys[] ]])) [] | @csv' $file
